raw_body: MRS. G.R. MAKAWITA. Wife of late retired Principal Mr. P. Widanagama who lived at No. 08, Rahula Cross Road, Matara, mother of Renuka, Champika Sanjeewa and Mirani, motherin- law of Hemal, Ajith, Woshika and Lasantha, grandmother of Isuri, Janidu, Vihagi, Diduli, Navini and Venudi, Mrs. G.R. Makawita, a retired teacher passed away.
